title: Celebration Mk2
summaries: The Celebration Mk2 is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord launcher that is an upgraded version of the Celebration. Upon use, it fires one of seven different special rocket types, regardless of the type of ammunition used. While it retains the destructive properties of its ammunition, it cannot place or delete liquids with liquid rockets. The weapon has a 22.22*2/9 (22.22%) chance to be dropped by the Moon Lord.
